name: Gravity Ghost: Deluxe Edition
storyline:
Surf the night sky. Careen through the cosmos. Find the fox. Don’t miss this genre-defying journey through the heart of the galaxy. 
 
When a ghost girl’s best friend goes missing, she’ll turn the whole universe upside down to find him. Set in a beautiful hand-painted world, Gravity Ghost is a planetary platformer where orbiting is an art form. In more than 100 dizzying levels, you’ll put your aerial skills to the test against planets that bounce, break, splash, spin, repel, and more.
summary:
The PlayStation 4 version of Gravity Ghost being released with new exclusive content. 
 
The Deluxe Edition includes a brand-new constellation, featuring 13 challenge levels and three bonus tracks. Unlock a new playable character, Voy the ghost fox, whose high jumps open a whole new galaxy of challenges. The DualShock 4’s lightbar effects punctuate the heartfelt story’s most emotional moments.
